message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. How about $175? I'm sure we can find a price that works for both of us.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we settle on $185?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $185 is still a little more than I'm comfortable paying.  I'm willing to go up to $180. If we can agree on that, I'm ready to buy.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $182, but I need to make sure I'm not losing out. Can we make it work at that price?
